name: Hoyle Card Games
overview: If you like to play cards, then you should get a copy of HOYLE CARD GAMES. There is a total of 14 different games to play including six variations of solitaire (Four Free, Golf Par 6 and Par 7, Klondike draw 1 and draw 3, and Pyramid), Crazy Eights, Cribbage, Gin, Go Fish, Hearts, Old Maid, Spades, and War. When you play, you can choose from 14 different personas like a balding professor, a crocodile, and a teddy bear. You can also play against a friend using the same system or via a link cable. Now you don't have to worry about finding a full deck of cards when you want to play, thanks to HOYLE CARD GAMES for the Game Boy Color.
